andromeda.why: Choose your 'yes' rather than being conscripted—seed of sovereignty.

arcturus.why: Basics of commitment hygiene: scope, pace, and simple containers.

draco.why: Early zeal can slip into policing others’ follow-through.

orion-dark.why: Rigidity—saying yes as doctrine rather than discernment.

orion-light.why: Micro-ordeal: keep showing up to the chosen path.

pleiades.why: Self-soothing and support make early commitments sustainable.

sirius.why: Private commitment practice; no explicit transmission yet.

arcturus.why: Place commitment in the right tempo and container for flow.

lyra.why: Graceful bearing helps commitments be received.

orion-light.why: Discipline to hold a clean yes and a clean no.

pleiades.why: Attuned support and warmth reinforce steady follow-through.

sirius.why: Relational steadiness, not formal instruction yet.

andromeda.why: Savior/victim loops from overcommitting outsource agency.

arcturus.why: Messy yes/no placement—structure breaks under trial.

draco.why: Gatekeeping and correctness posturing around ‘real commitment.’

orion-dark.why: Dogmatic compliance to commitments despite misfit.

orion-light.why: Ordeal teaches wise yes: refine scope, renegotiate, or release.

andromeda.why: Negotiates fair terms; frees teams from coercive yeses.

draco.why: Loyalty enforcement to shared commitments and thresholds.

lyra.why: Plain, elegant framing helps the pact land.

pleiades.why: Attuned stewardship keeps morale calm and bonded.

sirius.why: Teaches agreement protocol by example—how to commit well.

andromeda.why: Uses authority to end coercive commitments; restores choice.

arcturus.why: Sets standards for vows, scope, and review—container mastery.

draco.why: Upholds loyalty to the pact and mission integrity.

lyra.why: Clear, resonant language and tone unify the field.

orion-light.why: Holds integrity when pressure tests the promise.

pleiades.why: Mentoring warmth supports recommitment without shame.

sirius.why: Instruction in commitment law—vow hygiene and review cadence.

andromeda.why: Embodied sovereignty: choose only aligned commitments.

arcturus.why: Establishes enduring norms for commitment entry/exit and pacing.

draco.why: Aura can read as rank barrier guarding the pact.

lyra.why: Plain, archetypal phrasing sets the cultural tone of promise.
